'''Kamal el-Fayoumi''' ({{lang-ar|ÙÙØ§Ù Ø§ÙÙÙÙÙÙ}}) is is an [[Egyptian]] [[socialist]] and [[workers' rights]] activist<ref>http://www.almasryalyoum.com/en/node/158188</ref>. He is best known for is role as one of the leaders during the [[2008 Egyptian general strike]]<ref name="working class hero">{{cite news |title=A working class hero |author=[[Hossam el-Hamalawy]] |url=http://www.arabawy.org/2009/11/18/fayoum/ |newspaper= |date=November 18, 2009 |accessdate=May 4, 2011}}</ref>. He was also participated in the [[2011 Egyptian revolution]] as one of the leaders of the Egyptian workers who went on a strike.
